name: music-assistant
description: Music Assistant is a self-hosted music management and streaming platform that integrates with Home Assistant. It pulls media from services like Spotify or local libraries into structured playlists and collections.
features: Multi-source integration: Aggregate music from Spotify, local files, and streaming services into a unified library.
Home Assistant integration: Control playback on smart speakers and devices through Home Assistant automations.
Playlist management: Create and sync playlists across different music sources with automatic metadata matching.
Multi-room audio: Stream synchronized music to multiple speakers and zones throughout your home.
Library organization: Browse music by artist, album, genre, or playlist with automatic metadata enrichment.
Queue management: Build dynamic playback queues mixing tracks from different sources and services seamlessly.
Player support: Stream to Chromecast, Sonos, AirPlay, and other network audio devices from one interface.
Offline playback: Cache music locally for playback without internet connection or streaming service availability.
